mapper.select: select * from text order by noti_id desc
select text, notice_writing from text join notice_writing on text.noti_id = notice_writing.noti_id where noti_id = #{noti_id}
mapper.insert: insert into text(noti_id, txt_ttl, txt_cntn, txt_pl) values(noti_id.nextval, #{txt_ttl}, #{txt_cntn}, #{txt_pl})
mapper.update: update text set txt_ttl = #{txt_ttl}, txt_cntn = #{txt_cntn}, txt_pl = #{txt_pl} where mem_id = #{mem_id}
